entry.def: If someone spends their time globe-trotting, they spend a lot of time travelling to different parts of the world.

example.ex: The son of a diplomat, he has spent much of his life globe-trotting.
example.tran: 作为一名外交官的儿子，他一生有大量的时间在周游世界。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who travels widely and often

auth_sentence.content: Technology trainer and globetrotter Robbie Sandberg prefers to travel alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Technology trainer and globetrotter Robbie Sandberg prefers to travel alone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Technology trainer and globetrotter Robbie Sandberg prefers to travel alone.

auth_sentence.content: But since I met my third one, I've been a regular little globetrotter.
